WIDGET_ENVIE_DUVIDA_TEXTO: Interested in this flight but still have questions? Send your question and our team will get in touch.
WIDGET_VOO_1: To make the reservation you will only need to make a payment of R$300 which will be deducted from the final amount. On the day of the flight, the remainder can be paid in cash, pix or card.
WIDGET_VOO_2: *we will not accept payment links for the remaining amount, it is the passenger's responsibility to bring the appropriate payment methods.
WIDGET_VOO_3: **after payment, our team will contact you via WhatsApp or email to confirm the desired time.
ROTEIRO_OBS_1: *all points depend on favorable weather conditions and authorization from control bodies.
ROTEIRO_OBS_2: **certain points, such as Pão de Açúcar, require a safe distance.
ROTEIRO_OBS_3: ***there are no money refunds or discounts if a point on the itinerary is not visible.
DESCRICAO_PARTE_1: Come and take the most incredible tour of your life, flying over the most popular spots in Rio de Janeiro and see why it is known as the Marvelous City.
DESCRICAO_PARTE_2: On this tour you will enjoy an air-conditioned aircraft, with total comfort and internal communication. The pilot will also help inform those who don't know the places they fly over.
DESCRICAO_PARTE_3: For Helicoptair, quality always comes first and, therefore, you can trust that you will receive an excellent service. On this panoramic flight in Rio de Janeiro you also have a team fully capable of providing an unforgettable service for you and your family.
PARCEIROS_HELICOPTAIR_TEXTO: Together we provide a quality service with complete safety and compliance.

MESSAGE.SURE_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete?
MESSAGE.FILE_SIZE: The file size cannot exceed {{param}} kb.

OFERECEMOS.VOOS_PANORAMICOS_TEXTO: We offer the most incredible panoramic flights over Rio de Janeiro, flying over the main tourist attractions.
OFERECEMOS.VOOS_TRANSLADOS_TEXTO: We offer executive flights to different locations, with total comfort and convenience, in addition to exceptional quality.
OFERECEMOS.SERVICOS_FOTOGRAFICOS_TEXTO: We have a partnership with professionals in the field to promote takes of the flight so that you can enjoy and not worry about taking photos.
OFERECEMOS.TRANSFER_TERRESTRE_TEXTO: We have partnerships with ground transportation companies to carry out all transport procedures between the hotel and the take-off location.

DIFERENCIAIS.PRECO_JUSTO_TEXTO: Helicoptair cares about the customer and always seeks the best value for money so that everyone can enjoy this experience.
DIFERENCIAIS.INOVACAO_TEXTO: We care about the most advanced technologies and innovations to make this experience more pleasant for all our customers.
DIFERENCIAIS.EQUIPE_QUALIFICADA_TEXTO: The entire team is highly trained and has all the necessary certifications to provide your trip without risk and with total dedication.
DIFERENCIAIS.AGENDAMENTO_ONLINE_TEXTO: Make your reservation online and our team will contact you to confirm the information so that you can make your flight without any worries.

FOOTER.TEXTO: Come fulfill your dream of flying over Rio de Janeiro on an epic helicopter ride.
